cast.overview: Valentin is Acapulco's resident playboy, until a former fling leaves a baby on his doorstep and him heading with her out of Mexico.
cast.title: Instructions Not Included

details.biography: Jeannine Derbez artistic career has been filled with success, working in current Mexican theater, television and cinema, she comes from a family of artists, nephew of one of the greatest actresses in history of Mexico, "Sylvia Derbez", and cousin of one of Mexico's best known actors "Eugenio Derbez". She has a degree in acting from Televisa Acting School, as well as a degree in MMStudio from famous actress "Patricia Reyes Spindola", she also has study with Spanish actress "Marisa Paredes' and with directors as "Felipe Cazals"," Ignacio Ortiz","Mendoza" and in the NYFA (New York Film Academy). She has also a degree in classical ballet.  - IMDb Mini Biography
details.name: Jeannine Derbez
